com.yubico.jaas

Class MultiValuePasswordCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.security.auth.callback.PasswordCallback
      • com.yubico.jaas.MultiValuePasswordCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Callback

    public class MultiValuePasswordCallback
extends PasswordCallback
    A class that extends PasswordCallback to keep a list of all values set using setPassword(). If the application using this JAAS plugin wants to pass us multiple authentication factors, it just calls setPassword() more than once in the CallbackHandler.
    Author:
    Fredrik Thulin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
